name: Easyship Investment (BVI) Limited
description: Developer of an online platform designed to provide cross-border logistic services to eCommerce companies. The company's platform provides the trusted tools to fulfill orders, scale growth, elevate customer experiences, and also provides access to more than a hundred shipping companies, enabling clients to get an end-to-end process for pickup, packing, labeling, shipping, and tracking of goods easily.
one_liner: Developer of an online platform designed to provide cross-border logistic services to eCommerce companies. The company's platform provides the trusted tools to fulfill orders, scale growth, elevate customer experiences, and also provides access to more than a hundred shipping companies, enabling clients to get an end-to-end process for pickup, packing, labeling, shipping, and tracking of goods easily.
